name: Looking for Answers
description: Storyteller Josh Hart shares the journey of Darwin and Azucena Diaz, a newly-wed couple whose faith and passion for the Lord are a constant inspiration for others. They met at Seminario Teologico Bautista (Baptist Theological Seminary) where they both studied. Currently they attend church at Iglesia Evangelica Bautista Las Flores, where they lead the teen and young adult groups. They are involved with the leadership of their church and are seeking Godâ€™s leading as they prepare to go on the mission field.
author: Josh Hart
